data.name: RedlinePortion
desc: A RedlinePortion is a TextPortion that marks a change that has been recorded by the change tracking.

properties.name: IsInHeaderFooter
desc: determines whether the portion is member of a header or footer text.

properties.name: MergeLastPara
desc: determines whether the last paragraph of a redline text has to be merged with a possible following text content (i.e.

properties.name: RedlineAuthor
desc: contains the name of the author of the change.

properties.name: RedlineComment
desc: contains a comment for the change.

properties.name: RedlineDateTime
desc: contains the date and time of the change.

properties.name: RedlineIdentifier
desc: contains a unique identifier for the redline.
This is necessary for file export filters to able to recognize redline portions that point to the same redline.

properties.name: RedlineSuccessorData
desc: contains the data of a second level redline data
The elements of the sequence are:

properties.name: RedlineText
desc: provides access to the text of the redline.
This interface is only provided if the change is not visible. The visibility depends on the redline display options that are set at the documents property set (RedlineDisplayType).

properties.name: RedlineType
desc: contains the type of the change
